title: Jacksfilms

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of a day, give a YIAY prompt. Everyone must participate unless they're dead.
- You pick the best and worst responses. The best response cannot be hung that day. the worst will die.
 - However, if 7 or less players remain, this will be an extra vote instead.
 - You only know the faction of who sent which prompt, and people cannot say which prompt they sent.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You do not know who sent which prompt, and people cannot say which prompt they sent.
The first time someone tries to use an investigative ability on you, you will call them out on it, causing it to fail and exposing their role.
You cannot post a prompt on Day 1.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have everyone alive submit a good YIAY answer

desc:
Post 847
*"Leave your answers in the comments below! And I'll pick my favorites in the next episode of YIAY!"*
